author: Filmento
description:
2016's Assassin's Creed movie starring Michael Fassbender was supposed to be the Dark Knight level release of video game movies. And yet it wasnt... it sucked big time. Ruined my day. And it became a massive flop that destroyed the Assassin's Creed movie franchise and got the sequel cancelled. But what if that were not the case? What if the movie were actually good? In honor of Assassin's Creed Shadows coming out, let's go back to my original failure video about the AC movie and see what would happen if my old ideas were implemented in practice.

Book: https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0BW1TN97D?ref_=pe_3052080_276849420
Book, PDF: email me at saltyfilmento(a)gmail.com
